info.title: Fact Data API
info.description: API for all operations relating to the Find a Court or Tribunal Service

tags.name: Court Professional Information
tags.description: Operations related to professional services for courts

tags.name: Court Addresses
tags.description: Operations related to addresses available for courts

tags.name: Court Photo
tags.description: Operations related to photos for courts

tags.name: Types
tags.description: Operations related to types required for the functionality of both the admin portal and frontend

tags.name: Court Areas Of Law
tags.description: Operations related to Court Areas Of Law

tags.name: Local Authorities
tags.description: Operations related to court local authorities

tags.name: Court Translation
tags.description: Operations related to translation services available for courts

tags.name: Court Opening Hours
tags.description: Operations related to opening hours for courts

tags.name: Court Single Points of Entry
tags.description: Operations related to single points of entry for courts

tags.name: Court Contact Details
tags.description: Operations related to contact details available for courts

tags.name: Court Lock
tags.description: Operations related to court lock services

tags.name: Court Facilities
tags.description: Operations related to facilities available at courts

get.summary: Get court details by ID
get.description: Fetch detailed court information for a given court ID.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing court.

404.description: Court or associated region not found

get.summary: Get Single Points of Entry by court ID
get.description: Fetch Single Points of Entry configuration for a given court.

200.description: Successfully retrieved Single Points of Entry

put.summary: Update Single Points of Entry by Court ID
put.description: Updates the Single Points of Entry configuration for a given court.

schema.description: The updated Single Points of Entry for the court

400.description: court ID and/or Single Point of Entry configuration data is invalid

200.description: Successfully updated the Single Point of Entry configuration for the Court

get.summary: Get court opening hours by court ID and type ID
get.description: Fetch opening hours of a given type for a given court.Returns 204 if no opening hours of type exists for the court.

parameters.name: openingHourTypeId
parameters.description: UUID of the opening hours type

400.description: Invalid court ID or opening hour type ID supplied

204.description: No opening hours found for the court of this type

put.summary: Set opening hours of type for a court
put.description: Creates a opening hours of type for a court or updates the existing one.

parameters.name: openingHourTypeId
parameters.description: UUID of the opening hours type

400.description: Invalid court ID, opening hours type ID, or request body

delete.summary: Delete opening hours of given type for a court
delete.description: Deletes opening hours of given type for a court.

parameters.name: openingHourTypeId
parameters.description: UUID of the opening hours type

400.description: Invalid court ID or opening hours type ID

get.summary: Get court counter service opening hours by court ID
get.description: Fetch counter service opening hours for a given court.Returns 204 if no counter service opening hours exist for the court.

204.description: No counter service opening hours found for the court

200.description: Successfully retrieved court counter service opening hours

put.summary: Set counter service opening hours for a court
put.description: Creates a opening hours for a court or updates the existing one.

400.description: Invalid court ID or request body

get.summary: Get local authorities for a court
get.description: Fetch allowed areas of law enabled for the court and the local authorities.

204.description: No local authority configuration found for the court

put.summary: Update local authorities for a court
put.description: Update the local authorities mapped to the allowed areas of law (adoption, children, civil partnership, divorce) for a given court.

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or request validation failed

204.description: No local authority configuration found for the court

404.description: Court or local authority not found

get.summary: Get a specific contact detail for a court
get.description: Fetch a single contact detail by court and contact identifier.

400.description: Invalid court ID or contact ID supplied

404.description: Contact detail or court not found

put.summary: Update contact details for a court
put.description: Update an existing contact detail entry for the supplied court.

400.description: Invalid court ID or contact ID supplied, or invalid request body

404.description: Contact detail, court, or contact description type not found

delete.summary: Delete contact details for a court
delete.description: Remove an existing contact detail entry for the supplied court.

400.description: Invalid court ID or contact ID supplied

404.description: Contact detail or court not found

get.summary: Get Areas Of Law map with boolean by court ID
get.description: Fetch Areas Of Law with availability boolean for a given court.

put.summary: Create or update Court Areas Of Law for a court
put.description: Creates a new Court Areas Of Law for a court or updates the existing one.

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or invalid request body

201.description: Successfully created/updated Court Areas Of Law

get.summary: Get a specific address for a court
get.description: Fetch a single address by court and address identifier.

400.description: Invalid court ID or address ID supplied

put.description: Update an existing address entry for the supplied court.

400.description: Invalid court ID or address ID supplied, or invalid request body

delete.description: Remove an existing address entry for the supplied court.

400.description: Invalid court ID or address ID supplied

get.summary: Get favourite courts by user ID
get.description: Fetch favourite courts for a given user.Returns empty list if user has no favourite courts.

post.summary: Add a new favourite court for user

get.summary: Get translation services by court ID
get.description: Fetch translation services for a given court.

204.description: No translation services found for the court

post.summary: Create or update translation services for a court
post.description: Creates a new translation service for a court or updates the existing one.

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or invalid request body

get.summary: Get professional information for a court
get.description: Fetch professional information for a given court. Returns 204 if no professional information exists for the court.

204.description: No professional information found for the court

post.summary: Create or update professional information for a court
post.description: Creates new professional information for a court or updates an existing record.

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or invalid request body

get.summary: Get court photo by court ID
get.description: Fetch photo information for a given court.

404.description: Court or court photo not found

post.summary: Creates the photo for a court (and replaces any existing photo)

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or invalid file

delete.summary: Delete court photo by court ID
delete.description: Deletes the court photo associated with the given court ID.

404.description: Court or court photo not found

get.summary: Get lock status for a specific page of a court

400.description: Invalid court ID or page supplied

post.summary: Create or update court lock for a specific page

400.description: Invalid court ID, page or user ID supplied

201.description: Successfully created or updated court lock

delete.summary: Delete a court lock for a specific page

400.description: Invalid court ID or page supplied

get.summary: Get contact details for a court
get.description: Fetch all contact details associated with the supplied court ID.

post.summary: Create contact details for a court
post.description: Create a new contact detail entry for the supplied court.

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or invalid request body

404.description: Court or contact description type not found

get.summary: Get building facilities by court ID
get.description: Fetch building facilities for a given court.Returns 204 if no building facilities exist for the court.

204.description: No building facilities found for the court

post.summary: Create or update building facilities for a court
post.description: Creates a new building facilities for a court or updates the existing one.

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or invalid request body

get.summary: Get addresses for a court
get.description: Fetch all addresses associated with the supplied court ID.

post.description: Create a new address entry for the supplied court.

400.description: Invalid court ID supplied or invalid request body

get.summary: Get filtered and paginated list of courts
get.description: Fetch a paginated list of courts with optional filters.

get.summary: Get all service areas
get.description: Fetch all service areas.Returns empty list if no service areas exist.

get.summary: Get all regions
get.description: Fetch all regions.Returns empty list if no regions exist.

get.summary: Get all opening hours types
get.description: Fetch all opening hours types.Returns empty list if no opening hours types exist.

get.summary: Get all court types
get.description: Fetch all court types.Returns empty list if no court types exist.

get.summary: Get all contact description types
get.description: Fetch all contact description types.Returns empty list if no contact description types exist.

get.summary: Get all areas of law types
get.description: Fetch all areas of law types.Returns empty list if no areas of law types exist.

200.description: Successfully retrieved areas of law types

get.summary: Get court opening hours by court ID
get.description: Fetch opening hours for a given court.Returns 204 if no opening hours exist for the court.

204.description: No opening hours found for the court

get.summary: Get all active court locks for a court
Get court details by ID
get.description: Fetch detailed court information for a given court ID.

get.summary: Get court details by slug
get.description: Fetch detailed court information for a given court slug.

get.summary: Get court details by slug
get.description: Fetch detailed court information for a given court slug.

get.summary: Get all court details
get.description: Fetch detailed court information for all courts.

get.summary: Get all court details
get.description: Fetch detailed court information for all courts.

get.summary: The default root for the application

delete.summary: Clear all locks for a user during logout
Delete a favourite court for user
